attributes.action: to stop the use of Lay magistrates who are not legally trained,even though they deal with around 95% of court cases in england and wales. and to replace them with magistrates that are appropriately trained.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to stop the use of Lay magistrates who are not legally trained,even though they deal with around 95% of court cases in england and wales. and to replace them with magistrates that are appropriately trained.

how can people with no lagal training be expected to make decisions in law.
